chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 13 mini is experiencing the issue above.

Thank you for your help,

Once the package is received, the seller has 3 business days (5 if it's a laptop or home appliance) to replace or repair your product. Or, 2 business days to process a refund (if you're eligible).

A return is considered complete when the customer has met all the following conditions:

✔ Confirms that the product was not repaired by a third party and did not suffer any damage due to a fall or exposure to water.
✔ Has confirmed having the return label.
✔ Understands they must include accessories as well as proof of purchase in their package.
✔ Understands they have 14 days to use the return label.

Reminder: Once received, the seller has 3 business days (5 if it's a laptop or home appliance) to replace or repair your product. Or, 2 business days to process a refund (if you're eligible).

Hello ,

The customer informs us that he wishes to cancel his order because the delivery address is not the right one, I thank you for your help.

Thank you for your help,

Estelle, Back Market Customer Care

Dear Backcare,

I have informed our logistics partner regarding this order. Thank you.

Regards,
CH

Dear Backcare, 

The refund has been made. 

Regards, 
RK
